TITLE: Title
HOW_TO_USE: How To Use Wild Me Scout:
HELP_CHANGE_WILDBOOK_1: Open the side menu by clicking on the 3 bars or by swiping from the left.
HELP_CHANGE_WILDBOOK_3: Either stay logged into your current wildbook by pressing the active card OR...
HELP_CHANGE_WILDBOOK_4: Select a new wildbook to log into. This will log you out of your current wildbook.
HELP_CHANGE_WILDBOOK_5: Enter your username and password. If you do not have one, you can 'continue as guest' instead, and skip the rest of this guide (press the X in top right corner)
HELP_CHANGE_WILDBOOK_6: If you do have an account and have entered your credentials, press 'Login'
HELP_CHANGE_WILDBOOK_7: You are now logged into the other wildbook and can view past sightings.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_1: Press the + button located on the bottom corner of the view sightings page or select the 'New Sighting' option in the side menu.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_2: First, Select the sighting's images by tapping on the 'Add Images' area. Once completed, press the checkmark to come back to this screen.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_3: Next, press the Upload Images button. This will start the upload process while the rest of the form is being filled out.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_4: When filling out the form, it is encouraged to fill out each part. However, each form field that is required is noted by an asterisk.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_5: To navigate between sections, use the buttons at the bottom of the form to navigate between pages of them form.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_6: If at any point, you wish to discard the sighting form you have been working on, you can press the X in the top right corner to discard it.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_7: Otherwise, once you have filled out all of the form fields, press the 'Report' button to queue the sighting for upload.
HELP_ADD_SIGHTING_8: As each sighting is reported, you will be returned to the 'View Sightings' page, which should shortly show your new report.
